biolockj.exception

Class ConfigException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • biolockj.exception.ConfigException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigFormatException, ConfigNotFoundException, ConfigPathException

    public abstract class ConfigException
extends Exception
    ConfigException is the superclass for all BioLockJ configuration file Exceptions used to ensure message uniformity.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigException(String msg)
      Abstract Config exception calls super to instantiate using the superclass Exception implementation
      ConfigException(String propertyName, String type)
      Abstract Config exception calls buildMessage(String, String, String) to generate a standard error message for Configuration file errors, passing an empty string for the msg parameter.
      ConfigException(String propertyName, String type, String msg)
      Abstract Config exception calls buildMessage(String, String, String) to generate a standard error message for Configuration file errors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static String buildMessage(String propertyName, String type, String msg)
      Build a standard error message for Configuration file errors.

      • buildMessage

        protected static String buildMessage(String propertyName,
                                     String type,
                                     String msg)
        Build a standard error message for Configuration file errors.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - Property name
        type - Error type
        msg - Exception details
        Returns:
        Exception message that will be passed to superclass Exception via super()
